title: Best Screen Protectors For The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE
description: Scared for your S24 FE's display? These premium screen protectors will cover it against any damages.
author: Irene Okpanachi
excerpt: Scared for your S24 FE's display? These premium screen protectors will cover it against any damages.
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is designed to closely resemble the S24 model, which was named the king of Android earlier this year for its amazing features, including Galaxy AI. The FE version is the more budget-friendly price with slightly toned down specifications. It has a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 1900 nits. Even though it has durable Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+, it's wise to use a screen protector to prevent scratches and cracks. Here are seven options to keep your display safe. Best overall Spigen tempered glass screen protector $17.99 This Spigen case-friendly screen protector has edges that don’t reach the very edges of the phone. This way, your case can cover the sides without pushing up or damaging it when you're sliding it on. It also has 9H hardness and an oleophobic coating that resists fingerprints.  Best premium Asstar privacy screen protector $10.99 Another privacy screen protector you'll need is the Asstar product. It narrows the viewing angle to 25°, which means only you can see what's on your screen. Plus, it has a 9H hardness rating and installation is easy with the included alignment tool. It takes 15 seconds. Best budget Milomdoi 3-pack screen protector $7.99 Value is important in any purchase because it helps you get the best deal for your money. The Milomdoi product is just. It comes as a pack of three screen protectors and three camera lens protectors made from strong tempered glass. You'll have extras on hand in case of damage, or when you want to share with someone. Related: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Brings The Full Galaxy AI Omoton anti-scratch screen protector $8.99 The Omoton screen protector comes with a kit. It has everything you need to put the screen protector on yourself, so you won't have to pay someone else to do it for you. It'll help you align the glass perfectly, and avoid air bubbles or crooked placement. It also comes with camera lens protectors in one pack, and you'll save money on the extra products. Xiezezei touch resistant screen protector $12.99 Get a Xiezezei screen protector pack with four screen protectors and four camera lens protectors and experience 9H toughness. More importantly, the added layer doesn't affect fingerprint sensitivity, and you can unlock your phone without any delays. CWQZGUF 2-pack privacy screen protectors $12.99 If you're in a crowded place, you'll want to stop anyone from peeking into your phone and reading sensitive content. This product offers anti-spy technology, while still bringing high clarity to your display. It includes two screen protectors and two camera lens protectors, all designed to fit your S24 FE perfectly.  Bigface case-friendly screen protector $12.99 Black edges can be visually distracting and may clash with your phone’s design. The Big face protector and the added camera lens protectors come without them and have a clear design. Now, your screen remains bigger and you have a clear view of your display. The U-shaped cutout also fits around the selfie camera, so you can take pictures without blockage. Related: The Difference Between the Galaxy S24 and Galaxy S24 FE Guard your Galaxy S24 FE Now you have many screen protector options at your disposal. To protect your phone even more, buy a case for your Galaxy S24 FE. Look out for one that fits your lifestyle. If you're active, choose a rugged case. If you don't want anything flashy, get a slim or transparent case. But overall, ensure the case is specifically made for the Galaxy S24 FE, so it fits perfectly and allows easy access to buttons and ports. Irene is an experienced writer with four years in the Tech, E-commerce, and Food niches. She currently writes for Talk Android and Android Police, where she geeks out about the latest innovative practices, solutions, and gadgets. When not writing, Irene embraces her inner couch potato, finding joy in gaming, singing, music, and of course, eating. Previous Post
html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is designed to closely resemble the S24 model, which was named the king of Android earlier this year for its amazing features, including Galaxy AI. The FE version is the more budget-friendly price with slightly toned down specifications. It has a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 1900 nits.

Even though it has durable Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+, it's wise to use a screen protector to prevent scratches and cracks. Here are seven options to keep your display safe.

Best overall

Spigen tempered glass screen protector

$17.99

This Spigen case-friendly screen protector has edges that don’t reach the very edges of the phone. This way, your case can cover the sides without pushing up or damaging it when you're sliding it on. It also has 9H hardness and an oleophobic coating that resists fingerprints. 

Best premium

Asstar privacy screen protector

$10.99

Another privacy screen protector you'll need is the Asstar product. It narrows the viewing angle to 25°, which means only you can see what's on your screen. Plus, it has a 9H hardness rating and installation is easy with the included alignment tool. It takes 15 seconds.

Best budget

Milomdoi 3-pack screen protector

$7.99

Value is important in any purchase because it helps you get the best deal for your money. The Milomdoi product is just. It comes as a pack of three screen protectors and three camera lens protectors made from strong tempered glass. You'll have extras on hand in case of damage, or when you want to share with someone.

Related: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Brings The Full Galaxy AI

Omoton anti-scratch screen protector

$8.99

The Omoton screen protector comes with a kit. It has everything you need to put the screen protector on yourself, so you won't have to pay someone else to do it for you. It'll help you align the glass perfectly, and avoid air bubbles or crooked placement. It also comes with camera lens protectors in one pack, and you'll save money on the extra products.

Xiezezei touch resistant screen protector

$12.99

Get a Xiezezei screen protector pack with four screen protectors and four camera lens protectors and experience 9H toughness. More importantly, the added layer doesn't affect fingerprint sensitivity, and you can unlock your phone without any delays.

CWQZGUF 2-pack privacy screen protectors

$12.99

If you're in a crowded place, you'll want to stop anyone from peeking into your phone and reading sensitive content. This product offers anti-spy technology, while still bringing high clarity to your display. It includes two screen protectors and two camera lens protectors, all designed to fit your S24 FE perfectly. 

Bigface case-friendly screen protector

$12.99

Black edges can be visually distracting and may clash with your phone’s design. The Big face protector and the added camera lens protectors come without them and have a clear design. Now, your screen remains bigger and you have a clear view of your display. The U-shaped cutout also fits around the selfie camera, so you can take pictures without blockage.

Related: The Difference Between the Galaxy S24 and Galaxy S24 FE

Guard your Galaxy S24 FE

Now you have many screen protector options at your disposal. To protect your phone even more, buy a case for your Galaxy S24 FE. Look out for one that fits your lifestyle. If you're active, choose a rugged case. If you don't want anything flashy, get a slim or transparent case. But overall, ensure the case is specifically made for the Galaxy S24 FE, so it fits perfectly and allows easy access to buttons and ports.

Irene is an experienced writer with four years in the Tech, E-commerce, and Food niches. She currently writes for Talk Android and Android Police, where she geeks out about the latest innovative practices, solutions, and gadgets. When not writing, Irene embraces her inner couch potato, finding joy in gaming, singing, music, and of course, eating.
